trans-unit.source: Controls rights to access Domain Name System (DNS) servers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer tilgang til (DNS-System)-servere på nettverket.

trans-unit.source: The default permissions allow all local and Intranet zone applications to access DNS services, and no DNS permission for Internet zone applications.
trans-unit.target: Standardtillatelsene tillater alle lokale og intranett sone programmer for å få tilgang til DNS-tjenester, og ingen DNS-tillatelse for Internett zone-programmer.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> class that either allows unrestricted DNS access or disallows DNS access.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> klassen som tillater ubegrenset DNS-tilgang eller ikke tillater DNS-tilgang.

trans-unit.source: If `state` is <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, the <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance passes all demands.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `state` er <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten sender alle behovene.</xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: If `state` contains any other value, the <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance fails all demands.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `state` inneholder en annen verdi i <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten mislykkes alle behovene.</xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: state is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: stateer ikke et gyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: Creates an identical copy of the current permission instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en identisk kopi av den gjeldende forekomsten tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: A copy of a <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance provides the same access to DNS servers as the original permission instance.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av en <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten har samme tilgang til DNS-servere som den opprinnelige tillatelse-forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> class that is an identical copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: En ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> klassen som er en identisk kopi av den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> instance from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruerer en <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> forekomsten fra XML-koding.

trans-unit.source: The FromXml method reconstructs a <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance from an XML encoding defined by the <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden FromXml Rekonstruerer en <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten fra XML-koding er definert av <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>klasse.</xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> </xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission.ToXml%2A> method to XML-encode the <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance, including state information.
trans-unit.target: Bruk den <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission.ToXml%2A>metoden XML-kode den <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten, inkludert statusinformasjon.</xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> </xref:System.Net.DnsPermission.ToXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding til å bruke Bygg opp den <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: securityElement is .
trans-unit.target: securityElementis .

trans-unit.source: securityElement is not a element.
trans-unit.target: securityElementer ikke en elementet.

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission instance that is the intersection of the current permission instance and the specified permission instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en tillatelse-forekomst som er i skjæringspunktet mellom den gjeldende forekomsten tillatelse, og den angitte tillatelse-forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The Intersect method returns a <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance that allows the access defined by both the current <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance and the specified <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Intersect returnerer en <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>-forekomst som posttilgang som er definert av både gjeldende <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten og den angitte <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> </xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> </xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>

trans-unit.source: Any demand must pass both permissions to pass their intersection.
trans-unit.target: Behov må sendes både tillatelse til å sende skjæringspunktet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> instance to intersect with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> forekomsten til intersect med den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> instance that represents the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> instance with the specified <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> instance, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> -forekomst som representerer skjæringspunktet for gjeldende <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> forekomst med angitt <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> forekomsten eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis skjæringspunktet er tom.

trans-unit.source: If both the current instance and target are unrestricted, this method returns a new instance that is unrestricted; otherwise, it returns .
trans-unit.target: Hvis både den gjeldende forekomsten og target er ubegrenset, denne metoden returnerer en ny -forekomst som er ubegrenset; Hvis ikke, returneres .

trans-unit.source: target is neither a nor .
trans-unit.target: targetis neither a nor .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission instance is a subset of the specified permission instance.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den gjeldende forekomsten tillatelse er et delsett av den angitte tillatelse-forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance is a subset of the specified <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance if the current <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten er et delsett av den angitte <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>serverforekomsten Hvis gjeldende <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten angir et sett med operasjoner som ligger helt av den angitte <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> </xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> </xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> </xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>

trans-unit.source: If the IsSubsetOf method returns `true`, the current <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance allows no more access to DNS servers than does the specified <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance.
trans-unit.target: Hvis metoden IsSubsetOf returnerer `true`, gjeldende <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten tillater ikke flere tilgang til DNS-servere enn finnes det angitte <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> </xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> instance to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: Andre <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> forekomsten som skal testes for delsett-relasjonen.

trans-unit.source: if the current instance is unrestricted and target is either or unrestricted; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis gjeldende forekomst er ubegrenset og target enten eller ubegrenset; ellers, .

trans-unit.source: target is neither a nor .
trans-unit.target: targetis neither a nor .

trans-unit.source: Checks the overall permission state of the object.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer tilstanden for den totale tillatelse for objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> instance was created with <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> forekomsten ble opprettet med <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of a <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> instance and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en XML-kodingen for en <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> forekomsten og den gjeldende tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: The ToXml method creates a <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> instance to XML-encode a representation of the <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance, including state information.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ToXml oppretter en <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>serverforekomsten til XML-kode en representasjon av den <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten, inkludert statusinformasjon.</xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> </xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission.FromXml%2A> method to restore the state information from a <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> instance.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission.FromXml%2A>metode for å gjenopprette statusinformasjon fra en <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>forekomsten.</xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> </xref:System.Net.DnsPermission.FromXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"></xref> instance that contains an XML-encoded representation of the security object, including state information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"> </xref> forekomsten som inneholder en XML-kodet gjengivelse av sikkerhetsobjekt, inkludert informasjon om.

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission instance that is the union of the current permission instance and the specified permission instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en tillatelse-forekomst som Unionen av den gjeldende forekomsten tillatelse, og den angitte tillatelse-forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The Union method returns a <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance that allows the access defined by either the current <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance or the specified <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> instance.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Union returnerer en <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>-forekomst som tillater at tilgangen er definert av enten gjeldende <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten eller den angitte <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> </xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> </xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
trans-unit.target: En forespørsel som sender enten tillatelse sender sine union.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> instance to combine with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> forekomsten skal kombineres med den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> instance that represents the union of the current <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> instance with the specified <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> -forekomst som representerer Unionen av gjeldende <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> forekomst med angitt <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: If target is , this method returns a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Hvis target er , denne metoden returnerer en kopi av den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: If the current instance or target is unrestricted, this method returns a instance that is unrestricted; otherwise, it returns a instance that is restricted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den gjeldende forekomsten eller target er ubegrenset, metoden returnerer en forekomsten som ubegrenset; ellers returneres en -forekomst som er begrenset.

trans-unit.source: target is neither a nor .
trans-unit.target: targetis neither a nor .
